title: 川普最新采访 香港会有好事发生
contents:
Donald Trump: "I think that message is also helpful, respect of Hong Kong. Really good. I think it make it easier for Hong Kong to do something... I really think that message is a good message with respect to what the ultimate outcome is in Hong Kong"
